result.title: Foundations of Semantic Data Models and Tools, IoT and Big Data Integration in Multi-Cloud Environments
result.description: Analysis of available Semantic Data Models, Data Standards and Semantic Tools for Data Handling and Querying, with special focus on those domains of the Smart Space with major impact in the envisaged demonstration scenarios. Analysis of the requirements and challenges for the provision of a set of IoT and Big Data services over multi-cloud and network infrastructures covering the knowledge acquisition lifecycle from the aggregation from heterogeneous data, through the provision of Information Stream Processing services, to the extraction of Decision-Making supporting information.

result.title: A Proposal for Resource Isolation in Multi-Tenant Storage Systems
result.description: This deliverable consists of the design and implementation of multi-tenant isolation techniques for cloud systems that can be used in combination with existing application-level methods and leverage (i) OS-and system-based isolation primitives, to enable a second set of security controls, and/or (ii) existing dedicated security hardware (e.g., Trusted Platform Modules, Hardware Security Modules) and existing or new Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs) that are built upon the latter

result.title: Initial multi-cloud native application composite CSLA definition
result.description: This software deliverable will comprise the initial version of a tool to derive composite SLAs from elementary ones. For this, a description formalism will be defined (based, e.g., on ISO 19944) and extended if needed. Range definition for SLA metric values, composition and matching rules will be defined and implemented.
